entries.waypoint_description_1: The cave is teeming with narglatches who have chosen to make it their home.
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.player_reset: I decided to stop looking. I have other things to do.
entries.player_3_1: Why would I care about a narglatch colony?
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the narglatch cave?
entries.npc_reset: I don't blame you. Those narglatches aren't something I like messing with. Well, good day to you.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Well, they're up thataways a yonder. How about I just mark it down in your datapad, eh? Remember, this isn't fun and games. They may look all cuddley, but they'll rip your throat out the first chance they get. Good luck, friend.
entries.npc_4_1: Don't you know? Whenever narglatches come together and start settling down, they only pick a place that's rich in resources. That place they're at is a virtual bank in resources. Then again...you have to deal with the narglatches first.
entries.npc_3_1: I don't blame you. Those narglatches aren't something I like messing with. Well, good day to you.
entries.npc_2_1: Well, they're up thataways a yonder. How about I just mark it down in your datapad, eh? Remember, this isn't fun and games. They may look all cuddley, but they'll rip your throat out the first chance they get. Good luck, friend.
entries.npc_1_1: Whoohoo...barely made it out of that one today. I found a whole colony of narglatches nestled up in a cave a ways out. To think I was about to walk right inside and rest for a bit. If you've got nothing left to live for, I can tell you where to find them.
